content:
I don't have personal experience of local restaurants or cafes in paperback, but i can give you some suggestions on how to find some cozy places to eat.

1) ask locals: ask people you meet while exploring local art and culture for their favorite local restaurants or cafes with a cozy ambiance.

2) check online reviews: websites like yelp or tripadvisor are great resources for finding cozy restaurants and cafes in the area, as you can read reviews and see photos from other patrons.

3) look for cafes or coffee shops: these types of establishments often have a cozy atmosphere where you can sit and relax with a cup of coffee. 

4) explore local food markets: check out the local food markets for cozy spots to eat while enjoying the area's local flavors.

by using these suggestions, you should be able to find some cozy restaurants or cafes to enjoy a meal after exploring local art and culture in paperback.
